function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Confined classroom spaces with traditional desk layouts increase the risk of disease transmission and close contact between students.","Impact":"Increased potential for the spread of contagious diseases within the school environment, leading to higher infection rates among students and staff.","Mitigation":"Rearranging classroom layouts to accommodate social distancing, implementing strict hygiene protocols, and promoting outdoor teaching where feasible.","Technologies":"Moveable partition walls, desk-based extraction systems, floor-level extraction through mid-floor grilles.","People":"Students, teachers, school staff, and visitors to the school.","Owner":"School administration and facilities management."},{"Description":"Narrow and long shopping aisles in supermarkets can lead to congestion and increased close contact between shoppers.","Impact":"Elevated risk of disease transmission within supermarket environments, potentially leading to higher infection rates among customers and staff.","Mitigation":"Widening shopping aisles to facilitate social distancing, promoting online ordering with delivery options, and reevaluating product placement strategies to reduce congestion.","Technologies":"Online ordering systems, aisle widening modifications, and customer flow management technologies.","People":"Supermarket customers, employees, and delivery personnel.","Owner":"Supermarket management and facilities management."}]}
